mapper.sql: dict_id, pdict_id, dict_name, dict_value, alias_name, is_delete, sortno, createdby, created_time, modifiedby, modified_time
mapper.insert: insert into base_dictionary (pdict_id, dict_name, dict_value, alias_name, is_delete, sortno, createdby, created_time, modifiedby, modified_time) values (#{pdictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

pdict_id,
dict_name,
dict_value,
alias_name,
is_delete,
sortno,

created_time,
modifiedby,

mapper.update:
update base_dictionary
pdict_id = #{pdictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alias_name = #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdby = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update base_dictionary set pdict_id = #{pdictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_value = #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias_name = #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortno = #{sortno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdby = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiedby = #{modifiedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where dict_id = #{dictId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from base_dictionary where 1=1 and pdict_id = (select dict_id from base_dictionary where alias_name=#{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and is_delete=0 order by sortno asc
